subject: New York City Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: The Olympic men's marathon trials will be run in Central Park on New York City Marathon weekend in November 2007, and the women's trials will be in Boston, the day before its famed marathon in April 2008.
snippet: The Olympic men's marathon trials will be run in Central Park on New York City Marathon weekend in November 2007, and the women's trials will be in Boston, the day before its famed marathon in April 2008.
